Education

  • 2017: MSc in Chemistry, Master in Advanced Catalysis and Molecular Modelling (MACMoM), Universitat de Girona, Girona, Catalunya.

Research Topics

  • A joint PhD thesis between Donostia International Physics Center (DIPC) and Universitat de Girona (UdG) about a Theoretical Study of Chemical Structure and Reactivity of aromatic and antiaromatic excited molecular systems.
